column4: ok guys i admit iam stupid in this ubuntu system .. i dont know and i dont see and i cant understand any of this **** system . if any one got help here before in his life - it would be kind to give it back to some body else like me who need it . if no one is willing to help, said it clearly - so i can delete this **** system at all .

then why you all people are here if every thing available on the forums. ?
